reapack.name: MB_Buss Driver - Routing Utility GUI Manager Tool - Batch add or remove sends or receives on selected tracks.lua
reapack.desc: MB_Buss Driver - Batch add or remove send(s) or receive(s) on selected track(s)

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: New script name

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Add logo

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Add Select/deselect tracks checkbox

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Fix submit button text; fix channel dropdown options & behavior; clarify tracks subheading wording

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Add selected tracks display; fix Reset btn before settings opened

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Change target tracks box margin

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Fix regex for channel dropdowns

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Filter target tracks for existing sends/receives on change to Remove

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Filter target tracks for existing routing on sends/receives change

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Remove dev code

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Edit window title

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Add color contrast to track list

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Add script logo to ReaPack metadata

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Routing Settings: Pre-Fader (Post FX)/Pre FX are reversed (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/306)

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Change track name color logic (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/315); "Save choices & settings" doesn't save Add/Remove or Sends/Receive selection (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/316)

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Receive routing settings don't get picked up correctly (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/318); User options get saved in undo history. Should be outside (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/319)

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Include dev functions in ReaPack just in case

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Reset All Options silently selects all target tracks (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/323)

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Add notice when no routing available to remove (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/317)

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Add incrementing channels routing (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/297); MIDI channel & bus are reversed (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/330); Mono Audio channels display starts at 0 (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/331); Audio channel type detection broken over 16 chs (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/332); update rtk

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Add multichannel routing (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/300)

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Revert Issue 300 partial commit

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Incrementing channels should be on source not destination (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/336); Add warning if incrementing tracks hit max channels (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/337)

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Routing Settings popup too narrow on laptop screen (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/342)

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Add multichannel routing (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/300); Track list filter doesn't work right (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/351); Highlight selected track list with track color (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/353); Redisable action button on no target tracks selected; Add action + type to undo string (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/355); Disable incrementing for top values / All (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/357)

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Destination multichannel API value is wrong (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/358); Add user msg if no tracks selected on launch (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/359); Routing Settings window: Add close button (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/360); comment out dev include

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Make user message title more readable

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Fix crash creating routing with Audio > None

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Remove errant log call

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Increase max channels to 128

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Fix Add Receive incrementing logic (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/365, https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/366), Target tracks list doesn't clear when switching between Add and Remove (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/367)

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Update rtk; Refactor globals; Visible Routing Settings button states not updating with saved values; Settings applied to wrong send (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/369)

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Replace simple condition assignments with short-circuit evaluations

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Replace more simple condition assignments with short-circuit evaluations

reapack.name: MB_Fold source media into imploded takes at item length - if multiple takes, explode active take to new track.lua
reapack.desc: MB_Fold source media into imploded takes at item length - if multiple takes, explode active take to new track

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Fix filename (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/370)

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Fix package

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Fix globals

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: More globals work

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Initial upload

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Glue - Nondestructively glue selected item(s) into Superitem. Use 'Edit' later to reveal contained items & make changes.lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue: Reversible, nondestructive glue and nesting pooled audio for Reaper

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Change script name

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Correct ReaPack package metadata; Update rtk to 1.2.0 (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/276)

source.file: MB_Superglue - Edit - Reveal contained item(s) from selected Superitem previously glued by Superglue, retaining ability to Glue back to same Pool.lua
MB_Superglue - Options - Display - Background images on new Superglue items - Superitems diagonal, contained items horizontal stripes (On-Off).lua
MB_Superglue - Options - Display - Randomly color newly Superglued Superitem (On-Off).lua
MB_Superglue - Options - Global - Open script options window.lua
MB_Superglue - Options - Glue - Auto-increase channel count with take FX (On-Off).lua
MB_Superglue - Options - Glue - Time selection (not sizing region) determines Superitem bounds (On-Off).lua
MB_Superglue - Options - Reglue - Absolute or relative length change on Siblings if length propagation enabled (can still be altered by playrate) (Absolute-Ask-Relative).lua
MB_Superglue - Options - Reglue - Audio source position of Siblings is maintained (Enable-Ask-Disable).lua
MB_Superglue - Options - Reglue - Length change of Edited Superitem propagates to Siblings (Enable-Ask-Disable).lua
MB_Superglue - Options - Reglue - Looped source of Superitem determines Sizing Region bounds (On-Off).lua
MB_Superglue - Options - Reglue - Playrate of Siblings affects their length & position propagation values (Enable-Ask-Disable).lua
MB_Superglue - Options - Reglue - Position change of Edited Superitem's left edge propagates to Siblings (Enable-Ask-Disable).lua
MB_Superglue - Options - Reglue - Remove Siblings from Edited Superitem's Pool, giving every Sibling its own new Pool (On-Off).lua
MB_Superglue - Pool - Remove selected Superitem from current Pool & create new Pool for it.lua
MB_Superglue - Smart Action - Glue or Edit selected item(s) by context.lua
MB_Superglue - Smart Action - Glue or Unglue selected item(s) by context.lua
MB_Superglue - Unglue - Reveal contained item(s) from selected Superitem & detach from Pool. Use this instead of 'Edit' if you don't want your changes to propagate on reglue.lua
MB_Superglue - Utility - Display selected Superglue item info - Pool no., No. of contained items, Parent Pool, etc.lua
MB_Superglue - Utility - Set all Superitems in project to one custom color.lua
MB_Superglue - Utility - Dump Superglue project data to log.lua

version.changelog: Default img for restored instance backwards diagonal stripes (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/243)

reapack.name: MB_Select child (descendent) track(s) & deselect selected parent folder track(s).lua
reapack.desc: MB_Utilities: Various utility scripts for Reaper

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Add path check and refactor MB_Create new autoincremented folder and save project; enable nested children selection; deploy new take color script

source.file: MB_Create new autoincremented folder and save project.lua
MB_Deselect tracks if child track(s) & select their direct parent folder track(s).lua
MB_Open item properties or subproject or MIDI Editor and zoom to content.lua
MB_Set all takes on selected items to same series of random colors, correllated by take number.lua

version.changelog: Add new script duplicate item to lane

MB_Set all takes on selected items to same series of random colors, correllated by take number.lua
